name: Forest Essential Oil
desc:
Grants greater affinity for Dendro, boosting Dendro DMG.

It's a nourishing external medicine that promotes growth of plants, able to better channel Dendro energy.

value.text: Increases all party members' Dendro DMG by 25% for 300s.

customize.name: Forest Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Dendro, boosting Dendro DMG.

It's a nourishing external medicine that promotes growth of plants, able to better channel Dendro energy.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Lizard Tail
customize.desc: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.

customize.name: Sumeru Rose
customize.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

customize.name: Flaming Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Pyro, boosting Pyro DMG.
It is made of materials that gestate Pyro, which serves to draw in Pyro energy more effectively. It also makes the user more fired-up and passionate.

customize.name: Streaming Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Hydro, boosting Hydro DMG.
It's a slippery medicine for external use, able to better channel Hydro energy. It has a subtle fragrance.

customize.name: Frosting Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Cryo, boosting Cryo DMG.
It has a chilling sensation when applied, and helps one to better channel Cryo energy. It also helps to keep you cool-headed and calm.

customize.name: Gushing Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Anemo, boosting Anemo DMG.
It has a fragrant smell. It is said that using it during your travels will make you walk as if you're riding on the wind.

customize.name: Shocking Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Electro, boosting Electro DMG.
It induces a tingling sensation on the skin and renders the user better able to better channel Electro energy â€” but comes with a risk of causing an electrical fire that would definitely ruin your perfect hair.

customize.name: Unmoving Essential Oil
customize.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Geo, boosting Geo DMG.
You can feel the fine Geo pellets within when applied. It's said to help with physical injuries.
